info-section.title: We make DeFi as easy as possible for everyone
info-section.description:
The DeFi and crypto space in general is still in its genesis stage and has yet to experience mainstream adaption. That said, the AWINO ecosystem is built to be simple, intuitive and user friendly for new investors. But yet, has all the tools for experienced DeFi enthusiasts, non the less. 

AWINO is an All-In-One DeFi Ecosystem with a Decentralized Exchange, Lending Platform, Protocol Owned Liquidity (POL) module, Staking and Farming- All conveniently under one protocol.

items.title: Supply
items.description: Supply into the protocol and earn rewards as a liquidity provider.

items.title: Borrow
items.description: Borrow against your collateral from a selection of assets.

items.title: Swap
items.description: Trade your crypto fast and with ease.

items.title: Zap
items.description: Instantly create LP tokens of your choice.

items.title: Vote
items.description: Participate in voting for emissions distribution to your farming pool.

benefit-section.title: Why you should use our platform
benefit-section.description:
AWINO takes a problem-solving approach and addresses the following issues
 we are currently faced with in the DeFi and crypto space in general.

items.title: An All-In-One DeFi Ecosystem
items.description: AWINO brings DeFi to the community, all under one sustainable Ecosystem. A user-friendly, All-In-One DeFi Ecosystem, with multiple utilities from day one. A stealth launch with no pre-sale, whitelist, fund raising rounds, marketing or Venture Capitalists involved. AWINO is fully designed and funded by its two founders.

items.title: Liquidity / stability
items.description: AWINO has built mechanics within the token economics, with the intention to strategically provide and sustain liquidity within the ecosystem. This will allow for an ever increasing and organic trading volume, thus bringing stability in an otherwise volatile crypto market.

items.title: Protocol Owned Liquidity (POL) module
items.description: To ensure sustainability, AWINO invests within its own ecosystem. Rewards are re-invested back into the protocol, through regular buy-backs (AWINO and WEALTH tokens) and staking these native LP tokens. Thus, locking them inside our POL module, keeping them out of the circulating supply, forever. This allows the protocol to be profitable and sustainable, while constantly accumulating more of the native LP tokens.

items.title: Safety / security
items.description: Safety and security are major challenges that the crypto community faces on a daily basis. To address this, in addition to the initial audit, AWINO has set aside a generous bug bounty reward pool. This will encourage an ongoing monitoring and testing of our smart contracts, by various third parties.

faq-section.title: FAQs
faq-section.description: Below are our high-level FAQs. For more details on AWINO ecosystem we refer to our documentation.

items.title: What is AWINO about?
items.description: AWINO is an All-In-One DeFi ecosystem. Trading, lending, borrowing, voting, farming and pooling opportunities, are all conveniently made available in one place.

items.title: What can I do with AWINO?
items.description: You can lock, stake, provide liquidity or simply just hold your AWINO tokens and receive USDC rewards.

items.title: Why is AWINO different?
items.description: AWINO comes as a complete DeFi ecosystem, from day one.

items.title: Which problem is AWINO solving?
items.description: Using our POL module, AWINO solves the challenges of liquidity, sustainability, profitability and stability (see our About page for more details) that DeFi protocols often face, in the crypto space. In addition, AWINO places highest priority on our smart contract security, by setting up a dedicated and generous bug bounty reward pool.

items.title: What are the tokenomics?
items.description:
AWINO token total supply is 1,000,000,000
 WEALTH token total supply is 100,000
 There is a 12% buy and 15% sell fee on every transaction (set slippage to 13% and 16% respectively).

items.title: Who created AWINO?
items.description: AWINO was founded, designed and fully funded by Awino and Steve. The smart contracts of the AWINO ecosystem were all developed by a renowned software company, based in Switzerland.

join-section.title: Join the golden journey
join-section.description:
Earn, borrow and swap on the new DeFi gold standard.
 A leading decentralised crypto trading protocol.
